marklogic.body: When the going gets tough, the tough get going! And Nicky is tough as nails! She can do this with a point and shoot camera. She can do this without a camera by just drawing a photo. There are a lot of rules involved and so many directions that it intimidates me because I am challenged understanding all that stuff. Still, I will do my duty and check out each and every photo each and ever day until the end of this "meme". You see, I don't even have the Faintest idea what a "meme" is, but Nicky is indeed hawt as is Ziva, so for that reason alone I will leave my two cents every day. If you get tired, Nicky, you can Always just come and be a sister-wife and bring Ziva. We will play with my jewelry and stilettos every day.
